advancements.mostructures.description: 我們最好的結構清單，就只為你！
advancements.mostructures.church.title: 被遺忘的戰爭
advancements.mostructures.barnhouse.desc: 看起來他們很著急就離開了…
advancements.mostructures.pyramid.title: 傲慢的墳墓
advancements.mostructures.pyramid.descri: 也許你會在裡面找到什麼？
advancements.mostructures.icetower.title: 鬧鬼的屋子
advancements.mostructures.icetower.descr: 這個地方似乎吸引了很多流浪者......
advancements.mostructures.killerbunny.de: 任務: 殺兔子，獲得戰利品！
advancements.mostructures.pillagerfactor: 所以... 很多... 掠奪者...
advancements.mostructures.tavern.title: 餐飲和酒店
advancements.mostructures.tavern.descrip: 吃吧，休息吧，旅行者！ 我們掩護你
advancements.mostructures.tcits.title: 天空中的遙遠記憶...
advancements.mostructures.tcits.descript: 懷舊使這個結構起死回生。
advancements.mostructures.market.title: 商人去哪裡
advancements.mostructures.market.descrip: 一個熱鬧的交易和銷售商品的地方！ 也可以作為一個很好的基地。
如果你找到一個鐵魔像，向他致敬。 他參加了被遺忘的戰爭......
advancements.mostructures.pirateship.des: 等等，這些是烈焰使者嗎？？
advancements.mostructures.bazaar.title: 桑迪易貨
advancements.mostructures.bazaar.descrip: 在沙漠中尋找需要交易場所的旅行村民！

This place seems to attract lots of stra: This place seems to attract lots of strays...

A Distant Memory in the Sky...
Nostalgia brought this structure back fr: Nostalgia brought this structure back from the dead.
Traveling villagers who needed a trading: Traveling villagers who needed a trading place, in the desert!
A lively place for trading & selling you: A lively place for trading & selling your goods! Also serves as a nice base.
If you find an Iron Golem, salute him. H: If you find an Iron Golem, salute him. He fought in the Forgotten War...
